abilities.name: Overflowing
abilities.description: OverflowingAbilityBUFF Cecilion gains 10 extra Max Mana and recovers 10 Mana each time his skill hits an enemy. Cooldown: 1s. Cecilion has higher Max Mana and Mana Regen, and his skill damage scales with his Max Mana.

abilities.name: Bat Impact
abilities.description: Bat ImpactAbilityAoE Speed UpTypeMagic Skill Cecilion orders a giant bat to dive at the target location, gaining 30% extra Movement Speed for 1s while dealing 85(+80%Total Magic Power)(+5%Total Mana) Magic Damage to enemies in its path and 170(+160%Total Magic Power) (+10%Total Mana) extra Magic Damage to those near the landing point. Each subsequent cast within 6s increases this skill's Mana cost by 1.8 times (up to 4 stacks). 1.575

abilities.name: Sanguine Claws
abilities.description: Sanguine ClawsAbilityCC AoETypeMagic Skill Cecilion summons a pair of opposing claws at the target location that will clasp together after a short delay, pulling enemies in their paths to the center while dealing them 200(+45%Total Magic Power)(+1.2%Total Mana) Magic Damage and immobilizing them for 1s. 12.095

abilities.name: Bats Feast
abilities.description: Bats FeastAbilityBurst Speed UpTypeMagic Skill Cecilion unleashes his Blood Demon power, gaining 60% extra Movement Speed (decays over the duration) and Slow Immunity for 1.5s. Meanwhile, he fires 40 bolts of blood energy at nearby enemies, each dealing 35(+8%Total Magic Power)(+0.3%Total Mana) Magic Damage to the enemy hit and slowing them by 3% (up to 30%) for 1s. Each bolt also restores 10 plus 1% of Cecilion's lost HP for him on hit. 44.0150
